Unit was previously coded {MGC4220, MGC4220%, MGF4030, MGW4365}
Must be enrolled in course version {0181}
Must be enrolled in course version {0171, 0181, D30032}

unitName: Perspectives and paradigms in management theory
description: This unit analyses different ways in which management has been represented in management theory, and how these have affected judgements about the rationality and legitimacy of management practice.
